p: Animals were housed in specific pathogen-free environment in Lille Pasteur Institute's animal facilities. Housing and experimentations were carried out according to the French government guidelines of laboratory animal care and approved by the Departmental Direction of Veterinary Services (Prefecture of Lille, France; authorization number: AF 16/20090) and European guidelines of laboratory animal care (European Communities Council Directive of 1986 and revised in 2010, 2010/63/EU). Additionally, the present project has been submitted to, and approved by, the national Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (CEEA 75) and received the authorization number 00357.03.
